awd_titl_txt: Computer and Information Science and Engineering (CISE)     Research Instrumentation
awd_abstract_narration: A set of networked workstations will be provided for researchers at the         University of California for research in the Department of Electrical           Engineering.                                                                                                                                                    This equipment is provided under the Instrumentation Grants for                 Research in                                                                     Computer and Information Science and Engineering program.                                                                                                       The research for which the equipment is to be used will be in the areas         of                                                                                                                                                              1)   Automatically recoverable distributed computer systems for real-           time             applications.                                                                                                                                  2)   Packet communications protocol.                                                                                                                            3)   Methodology for synthesis of VLSI systems.                                                                                                                 4)   Architecture concepts for high-speed pattern recognition.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
